sentences.translation: He is knocking on the door.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到他疯狂地敲门，我立刻跑去开门。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到他瘋狂地敲門，我立刻跑去開門。
sentences.pinyin: Tīng dào tā fēngkuáng de qiāo mén, wǒ lìkè pǎo qù kāimén.
sentences.translation: Hearing him knock on the door frantically, I immediately ran to open the door.
He is knocking on the door.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到门外有人敲门的声音，他急忙跑去开门。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到門外有人敲門的聲音，他急忙跑去開門。
sentences.pinyin: Tīng dào mén wài yǒu rén qiāo mén de shēngyīn, tā jímáng pǎo qù kāi mén.
sentences.translation: Hearing the sound of someone knocking on the door, he hurriedly ran to open the door.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到有人在门上敲，他立刻去开门。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到有人在門上敲，他立刻去開門。
sentences.pinyin: Tīng dào yǒu rén zài mén shàng qiāo, tā lì kè qù kāi mén.
sentences.translation: Hearing someone knocking on the door, he immediately went to open the door.

sentences.pinyin: Tā qiāo le wǒ yībǎi kuài.
sentences.translation: He overcharged me by a hundred.

sentences.simplifiedText: 当我意识到我被敲了一百块钱时，我立刻返回商店和店主争论。
sentences.traditionalText: 當我意識到我被敲了一百塊錢時，我立刻返回商店和店主爭論。
sentences.pinyin: Dāng wǒ yìshí dào wǒ bèi qiāo le yībǎi kuài qián shí, wǒ lìkè fǎnhuí shāngdiàn hé diànzhǔ zhēnglùn.
sentences.translation: When I realized that I had been overcharged by a hundred dollars, I immediately went back to the store to argue with the owner.
